channel.title: Server/Code Help
channel.description:
so my problem is.. When i put my cache into a .zip file and drop it in Dropbox so i can make an autocache downloader on my client. but when i give my friend my .jar file of my client, it downloads for him and everything but when he opens the file my custom weapons are not working nor items that i added to the server is not working... Anyone know why.
* And Yes it works for me because i have my cache and my custom weapons already in cache, my whole point my friends are not getting the updated cache of the one i added items in.

item.title: Server/Code Help
item.dc:creator: @PeteVT PeteVT
item.description:
@PeteVT wrote:

yes i have updated the sign.class, as i am not sure if i did it right. look at this picture will you confirm to me which as i edited the bottom(lightblue)*highlighted, do i update the green highlighted on too?

[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/191/editcn.png/][IMG]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/7872/editcn.png[/img][/URL]

Read full topic

item.title: Server/Code Help
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“PeteVT, post:1, topic:441199”]so my problem is… When i put my cache into a .zip file and drop it in Dropbox so i can make an autocache downloader on my client. but when i give my friend my .jar file of my client, it downloads for him and everything but when he opens the file my custom weapons are not working nor items that i added to the server is not working… Anyone know why.

  • And Yes it works for me because i have my cache and my custom weapons already in cache, my whole point my friends are not getting the updated cache of the one i added items in.[/quote]
    Rename the output in your signlink class. After that, they will have to obtain an updated class file of your signlink class.

Read full topic
